name: RimeOfficial.GitHub.io
body:
# World Wide Web >

The World Wide Web (WWW) is an open source information space where documents and other web resources are identified by URLs, interlinked by hypertext links, and can be accessed via the Internet.[1] The World Wide Web was invented by English scientist Tim Berners-Lee in 1989. He wrote the first web browser in 1990 while employed at CERN in Switzerland.[2][3]

> > — [From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Wide_Web) Or we (sometimes) call it **World Wide Weed!** 🍀🍀🍀
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
